---

> **PR title format:** This repo enforces [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) on PR titles.
> Your title becomes the squash-merge commit message on `main`, so make it count.
>
> **Format:** `type(scope): description` or `type: description`
>
> **Examples:**
> - `feat: add dependency resolution`
> - `fix(compiler): rewrite staged error paths`
> - `docs: update README with build instructions`
> - `feat!: rename --output flag` *(breaking change)*
>
> **Valid types:** `feat`, `fix`, `docs`, `chore`, `refactor`, `test`, `ci`, `build`, `perf`
